entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
